title: Falling Light
description: In the quaint town of Mercy, where whispers of saints and angels are passed down, Rosalynn Young religious conviction isnâ€™t deep and she has no interest in murals depicting mystical creatures on the ceilings of churches. While her friends sought leisure and fun for summer break, Rosalynn's path led her to the doors of the grand Millennium Hotel, where fate introduced her to the enigmatic Victor Gregorie. Drawn into Victor's web, Rosalynn soon realizes that beneath Victor's broody facade lay a past shrouded in darkness. Against all warnings, Rosalynn is determined to unravel the mysteries that surround him, unaware of the dark forces lurking in the shadows.She soon learns the sleepy town she calls home holds terrifying secrets and Rosalynn finds herself engulfed in a shadowy world of fallen angels and darklings as she embarks on a summer unlike any other.
author: Dayana Morency
